    • PlayerDashboard

      public PlayerDashboard​(Storage storage, ResourceCount chest, DeckDashboard[] devCards, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards, java.lang.String nickname, int points, boolean isLorenzo)
      Parameters:
      storage - passed Storage
      chest - ResourceCount that simulate the player's chest
      devCards - Array of DevelopmentCard bought by the player
      leaderCards - ArrayList of LeaderCard that are the leader owned by the player
      nickname - nickname of the player
      points - total of victory Points

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull​(Resource res)
      If a leader with a depositability with a certain resources is in game and is already full return true; in every other case false
      Parameters:
      res - specific resource searched
      Returns:
      true if there's a full SpecialDeposit for that resource or if there is none
